entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned as having been brought to the hospital wing multiple times due to Quidditch injuries.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, mentioned as sleeping and having a snore.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: The nurse at Hogwarts, mentioned as coming out of her office and waving her wand to dim the lamps.

entities.name: rufus scrimgeour
entities.description: A character mentioned as having power, but not further described.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student, mentioned as someone Harry would have liked to set a tail upon if he had more power.

entities.name: aurors
entities.description: A group of wizards mentioned as being at Rufus Scrimgeour's command.

entities.name: da
entities.description: The Dumbledore's Army, mentioned as an organization that Harry thought about joining to set up something.

relationships.description: Harry was visited by Madam Pomfrey in her office.
Harry and Ron share the same room, as evidenced by Ron's snore.
Harry thought about joining the DA to set up something.
